title: Cant play Bard
body: So today i purchased bard and played a bot match to try him out. I than came back on around 3 hours later and when i tried to play a bot match bard was grayed out and i couldnt play him. This is very annoying as i was looking forward to playing him. thanks btw hi forums this is my first post ;3

replies.body:
>thanks btw hi forums this is my first post ;3

This is not the forums, these are the boards.

I hate the boards. I loved the forums.

There seems to be a game-breaking bug with Bard at the moment. Strange that Riot don't have an official announcement about it yet.
